segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely focused on her task, unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of disbelief, wondering how she can be so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are quietly taking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is standing precariously on a stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting eagerly, her hand outstretched to receive a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of amusement, remembering my own childhood adventures.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, creating a large puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman doesn't notice the water or the children's actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is peaceful, contrasting with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns off the faucet soon and notices the children.
segments.speaker: PAR
